thread.title: Liam Payne and Cheryl Cole welcome first child together -- see the cute first photo!
thread.title_full: Liam Payne and Cheryl Cole welcome first child together -- see the cute first photo!

author: Jennifer Drysdale
title: Liam Payne and Cheryl Cole welcome first child together -- see the cute first photo!
text:
It's a boy for Liam Payne and Cheryl Cole!
On Wednesday 22nd March Liam and I became parents to an incredibly beautiful, healthy baby boy, weighing 7lb 9 and looking like a dream. Although he still doesn't have a name he is already stealing hearts. We are all madly in love and overwhelmingly happy with our little arrival. Happy Mother's Day to all the mothers around the world. A day that now has a different meaning to me forever ðŸ’™ 
A post shared by Cheryl (@cherylofficial) on Mar 25, 2017 at 1:25pm PDT 
Read more...
